review: Excellent device will recommend to everyone

review: Easy to configure and use.  I had all 5 of my streaming applications installed and configured within 15 min of plugging the device in to my TV
author: LovetoRead

review: It took too much data, i cant even use it. How can I send it back?

review: I love it.  I have streaming TV.  Works great with Netflex, and Amazon prime.  The price is right.

review: So glad I purchased the Firestick
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love it so far.  I was having trouble viewing Amazon Prime and sometimes Netflix through our Wii and was told that I wouldn't be able to see Prime with our DSL internet but lo and behold, it has been working very well with few buffers!
author: Debrwings
